Title: MEFedMVVM
Description: Library for building MEF MVVM applications for Silverlight and WPF. By using this library you can easily build MVVM application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Library for building MEF MVVM applications for Silverlight and WPF. By using this library you can easily build MVVM application.
